name: Edición Limitada Torpedo Dos Capas
additionalNotes:
Apparently conceived more for its novelty appearance than its inspired combination of leaves, 
this double wrapped barber pole style Mexican maduro/US Connecticut shade cigar with a Dominican/Nicaraguan filler is constructed with great care and smokes evenly until the last two inches. It's a pleasant smoke, but lacks its own identity. It tastes generic or plain. No 
sour offtones, just unspectacular.
